a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Percentage of men and women (age 15-49) who solely own a land which is legally registered with their name or cannot
be sold without their signature. Colors represent world regions. Bubble sizes are proportional to the population of the
Women who own land alone (% of women)
Men who own land alone (% of men)
Data source: World Bank, Gender Statistics (based on multiple sources)
